name: Data Cleansing Advanced
description: This node cleanses the selected columns from the dataset
input: It accepts a DataFrame as input from the previous Node

fields.name: removeNullRows
fields.title: Remove Null Rows
fields.description: Removes rows with null values in any selected column; removes all rows if no columns are selected

fields.name: nullRowsCols
fields.title: Columns for Null Rows Check
fields.description: Select columns to apply Remove Null Rows operation

fields.name: removeNullColumns
fields.title: Remove Null Columns
fields.description: Removes columns with all null values; removes selected columns with at least one null if columns are specified

fields.name: nullColsCols
fields.title: Columns for Null Columns Check
fields.description: Select columns to apply Remove Null Columns operation

fields.name: inputCols
fields.title: Input Columns
fields.description: Select columns to be processed for data cleansing

fields.name: replaceWithBlanks
fields.title: Replace Nulls With Blanks (String Fields)
fields.description: Replaces null values in string fields with empty strings ('') for the corresponding selected column

fields.name: replaceWithZero
fields.title: Replace Nulls With 0 (Numeric Fields)
fields.description: Replaces null values in numeric fields with 0 for the corresponding selected column

fields.name: removeWhitespaces
fields.title: Remove Whitespaces
fields.description: Removes whitespace characters from the corresponding selected columns

fields.name: removeLetters
fields.title: Remove Letters
fields.description: Removes alphabetic characters from the corresponding selected columns

fields.name: removeDigits
fields.title: Remove Digits
fields.description: Removes numeric digits from the corresponding selected columns

fields.name: removeSigns
fields.title: Remove Special Signs
fields.description: Removes special symbols or signs from the corresponding selected columns

fields.name: removeCommas
fields.title: Remove Commas
fields.description: Removes commas from the corresponding selected columns

fields.name: modifyCases
fields.title: Modify Case
fields.description: Converts text in the corresponding selected columns to upper, lower, or title case
